meanings.definition: John Connally (1917-1993): American politician, Governor of Texas, and Secretary of the Treasury.
meanings.english_definition: John Bowden Connally Jr. (1917 – 1993) was an American politician. He served as the 39th Governor of Texas, Secretary of the Treasury under President Richard Nixon, and as a Democratic and later Republican party leader.
A place name derived from the surname.

etymology.value: From the Irish surname Ó Conghaile, meaning descendant of Conghal. Conghal is a personal name meaning 'brave wolf'.
